message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $15000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $12500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $12500 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you consider that?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I've already compromised a lot by offering $12500. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. How about we meet at $10000? This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9200. Can you consider that?
